attributes.action: Change Postal town of North Solihull
attributes.additional_details:
The people of North Solihull are made to feel like they do not belong to a particular community. People in the South of the Borough seem to disregard us and tell us we live in Birmingham and the people in Birmingham think that we live under Birmingham City Council.
I propose that the Postal Town of the areas of Castle Bromwich, Kingshurst, Fordbridge, Marston Green, Smiths Wood and Chelmsley wood be changed from "Birmingham" to "Solihull".
